Name: BeCivilstate
Title: BeCivilState
Descriptino: Codes supported by eHealth Platform differentiating types of civil state. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort. Whenever possible add a code from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus for international interoperability but also use https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/core/CodeSystem/CD-CIVILSTATE for the Belgian specific code.
